div.pre: 1957 Taranto, 1926 (1059) Burial: c. 282 B.C. Contents: 36+ AV Taras: c. 15 st.; c. 14 half-st.; c. 5 quarter- st.; c. 2 eighth-st. Disposition: Vlasto 7 (Cat. 6, 31, 36-8, 40-1; Jameson 2 (Cat. 2392-93); New York 2 (SNG 1038, 1040) Vlasto, NC 1930, pp. 144-51, illus. A 1934 letter from Vlasto in the ANS adds to the totals given in NC 1930 3 st. (NC, pp. 145-7, nos. 1, 3, 6) and 1 eighth-st., and states that more half-st. and quarter-st. from the hd. had also come on the market
